channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Opposite 164 Shaftesbury ave, 4th November
item.description:
The no right turn into mercer street is in the wrong position There should also be one on the crossing As cars and vehicles still turn right into mercer street approaching north in Shaftesbury avenue I reported this to Camden and they told me it’s Westminster responsibility

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Seven Dials, Bloomsbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car with NO tax and NO MOT on Kinder Close opposite 4 Kinder Close, 4th November
item.description:
Abandoned car with NO tax and NO MOT on Kinder Close - has been there for months. Reg number; RV58ATZ Silver Citroen. Response UK Security LTD company name written over the side of the car - telephone number; 01322 553105 Please can this be looked into

item.title: Drain cover, 4th November
item.description:

item.title: Dumped air mattress and waste, 4th November
item.description:

item.title: Fly tipping in Bromley Palace Park, 4th November
item.description:
Dear all, I reported this fly tipping by the people who have recently landscaped their garden and erected a new fence. Instead of taking away all their waste, they have fly tipped it in our park, which is the other side of their new fence. You showed this as CLEARED/COMPLETE, clearly it hasn’t been removed as there is still a very large pile of soil, plastics, wood, cement, rocks, and even a large keep left traffic cone! Please can this actually be addressed and all of the fly tipped items removed. Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Chase, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet
